user.title: Emlog
user.description: Configure host/IP, meter type (electricity/gas), and meter number (1-4).

data_description.meter_type: Select 'Strom' for electricity meter or 'Gas' for gas meter. You can add multiple services.
data_description.meter_index: Meter number in the Emlog device (usually 1 or 2 for electricity, 2 or 3 for gas).

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Emlog API. Please check host/IP and network.
error.timeout_connect: Timeout connecting to Emlog API. Please check host/IP.
error.invalid_response: Invalid response from Emlog API. Please verify it's an Emlog device.
error.unknown: Unknown error connecting to Emlog API.

init.title: Emlog Settings
init.description: Configure prices and gas factors. Use helper entities for dynamic values or static fallback values.

data.base_price_strom: Base price electricity per month (EUR, fallback)
data.base_price_gas: Base price gas per month (EUR, fallback)
data.include_feed_in_sensors: Enable feed-in sensors for solar installations

data_description.price_helper: Select an input_number or sensor entity for dynamic pricing. If empty, fallback value will be used.
data_description.price_kwh: Energy price per kWh, used when no helper entity is configured.
data_description.base_price_strom: Monthly base price for electricity (e.g., 15.00 EUR/month).
data_description.base_price_strom_helper: Select an input_number for dynamic base prices.
data_description.base_price_gas: Monthly base price for gas (e.g., 10.00 EUR/month).
data_description.base_price_gas_helper: Select an input_number for dynamic base prices.
data_description.monthly_advance_strom: Monthly advance payment for electricity (e.g., 120.00 EUR/month).
data_description.monthly_advance_strom_helper: Select an input_number for dynamic advance payments.
data_description.monthly_advance_gas: Monthly advance payment for gas (e.g., 80.00 EUR/month).
data_description.monthly_advance_gas_helper: Select an input_number for dynamic advance payments.
data_description.settlement_month: Month when the annual settlement is expected. Used for forecast calculations.
data_description.gas_brennwert_helper: Select an input_number or sensor entity for dynamic calorific value. If empty, fallback value will be used.
data_description.gas_brennwert: Calorific value for m³ → kWh conversion, used when no helper entity is configured.
data_description.gas_zustandszahl_helper: Select an input_number or sensor entity for dynamic compressibility. If empty, fallback value will be used.
data_description.gas_zustandszahl: Compressibility factor for m³ → kWh conversion, used when no helper entity is configured.
data_description.include_feed_in_sensors: Enables optional sensors for electricity feed-in from solar installations (feed-in counter, feed-in power, daily feed-in, feed-in amount). These sensors are only created for electricity meters.
